page.title: 17DAILY LIFE WELBURY HOUSEWIFE
page.content: At 7a.m. I make breakfast for my 2 children, who both attend school. Andrew goes to Brompton C.P.School and Nicola to Allertonshire School. They both take the same bus to school at 8.20a.m. At 9.30.a.m. I drive to Brompton School to help the Infant class with their baking session, which I do once a fortnight. Then on to Northallerton to shop and have lunch. This afternoon I am helping to prepare food for a"Sangria Evening"which Major & Mrs.Arkwright are holding to help funds for a better Village Hall. I then make tea for 3,as my husband works away for 2 weeks at a time on an Oil Rig as an Instrument Engineer.A car is essential,as most evenings I have to take the children to some activity e.g.,swimming,cubs,guides,tennis.
